mapper.insert: insert into likes (board_no, post_no, cmt_check, cmt_no, liker_mem_no, liking_mem_no, like_del_check) values ( #{board_no:INTEGER}, #{post_no:INTEGER}, #{cmt_check:BOOLEAN}, #{cmt_no:INTEGER}, #{liker_mem_no:INTEGER}, #{liking_mem_no:INTEGER}, #{like_del_check:BOOLEAN} )
mapper.delete: update likes set like_del_check=true where like_no=#{like_no} and like_del_check=false
mapper.select: select * from likes where like_no=#{like_no:INTEGER} and like_del_check=false
